CustomField.description: Field name to use to retrieve node caption/title. Note that this field will be used as 'group by' field for the group by nodes. This field is required for group by and query type of nodes.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field name to use to retrieve node caption/title. Note that this field will be used as 'group by' field for the group by nodes. This field is required for group by and query type of nodes.
CustomField.label: Caption Field Name
